articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Talk to Me trailer shows off 2023’s scariest horror movie so far - Polygon
articles.description: Talk to Me, A24’s new horror movie, is about a group of teens that turn possession into a game for getting high, until things go tragically wrong. The movie comes to theaters on July 28.
articles.content: A24s new horror movie turns possession into a drug

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Brandon Deener: the hip-hop producer turned Afrofuturist artist - The Guardian
articles.description: He worked with Missy Elliot, Timbaland and Lil Wayne and is now showing a new side to his art at a fascinating new exhibition in New York
articles.content: Brandon Deener, former producer for hip-hop and R&B royalty such as Timbaland, Missy Elliot and Lil Wayne, wears the multi-hyphenate badge well. Hes now known more as a visual artist and musician… [+6050 chars]

articles.title: Who is Micheál Richardson? Meet Liam Neeson and Natasha Richardson's son - Daily Mail
articles.description: Not just the son of Liam Neeson and the late Natasha Richardson,  Micheál is the grandson of actress Vanessa Redgrave and filmmaker Tony Richardson.
articles.content:
As a scion of Hollywood heavyweights, it's unsurprising that Micheál Richardson has pursued a career in acting.
